resources.string: Falha ao carregar versões. Verifique sua conexão.
Falha ao carregar releases. Verifique sua conexão.
Deseja remover todos os downloads concluídos da lista?
Tem certeza que deseja excluir os %1$d downloads selecionados? Os arquivos baixados também serão removidos.

This feature attempts to download files directly from certain hosting services using the app's built-in download manager, potentially skipping intermediate web pages. • Reliability: This is an experimental feature. Success may vary, and downloads might not always work if hosting websites change their structure. This feature relies on analyzing page content, which can break. • Supported Hosts (Current Status): - MediaFire: Active support. - Google Drive: Active support (may involve confirmation steps). - Archive.org: Active support. - Buzzheavier, Gofile.io, Datanodes.to, Pixeldrain: Experimental (direct links may not be found). Check for app updates for improvements and more supported hosts. • How it Works: When you provide a link, the app tries to find a direct path to the file. If successful, it uses that path. If not, it will use your original link. • Troubleshooting: - If a direct link attempt fails or the download doesn't start, try using the original link with your regular browser or download method. - Ensure your app is up-to-date. • Not a Search Tool: This feature is for use with URLs you provide. The app does not search for files. • Feedback: If you encounter issues with specific links, please report them. This helps us improve the feature. (See app settings or contact support for how to provide feedback).
